That is not right.  Grub must overwrite the MBR in order to use it to choose which OS to boot.
the MBR currently has the windows bootloader in it.  The windows bootloader only boots windows.  If you install linux you must write in the HDDs mbr to boot it.
You use grub in the MBR to boot linux.  You cannot use the windows bootloader in the MBR to boot linux.
The MBR does not load things.  a boot loader in the MBR loads things.
